welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Greenwood Village, where small-town charm meets big-city amenities. Known for its beautiful parks, shopping, and dining options, we invite you to explore and experience all that our vibrant city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Arapahoe Co Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Arapahoe Co Airport caters to private jets and VIP travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Jeppesen Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Denver International Airport, housing ticketing, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: A Gates
terminals.description: One of three concourses at Denver International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: B Gates
terminals.description: One of three concourses at Denver International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: C Gates
terminals.description: One of three concourses at Denver International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with no time limit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Jeffco Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including dining options, retail shops, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal at Jeffco Airport caters to private jet owners and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for all travelers.
